law.text: Any person who violates or aids in the violation of any provision of KRS 227A.020 shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction shall be fined not less than five hundred dollars ($500) nor more than five thousand dollars ($5,000), or sentenced to jail for not less than ten (10) nor more than one hundred eighty (180) days, or both.
law.history: Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 13, effective June 24, 2003.
